entry.data:
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS LATE THIS EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT

SNOW AND RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
